Author: NewBullMoose
Text: If you're willing to reach out, even just to us on this sub, you have it in you to get better. It won't be easy. Far from it. But we both know it'll be worth it. Few things worth doing are easy, and this is no exception. Today you took a big step in expressing your feelings to other people. You know that something's not right, and that's the first step. Now it's time to take your life back. You deserve to get better, and if you don't do it for yourself, do it for Audrey. Regardless, feel better!
